title: 8th generation iPad returns to $299 record low price at Amazon
author: tabitha-baker
summary: Another chance to grab an excellent price
article: Cheap iPad deals have been available for a few months now, but this $299 price tag on the 8th generation iPad has been dropping in and out over the course of its release. You've got another chance to scoop up that lowest price ever this week, however, with a fresh batch of cheap iPads available at Amazon.

What's more, we've only seen this discount hitting the Gold model when available over the last month. However, this week you'll find the Space Gray version also on sale - perfect if you're after a more subtle aesthetic.

It will be stock levels that drive this price back up, so if you've had your eye on a brand new tablet for a while, we wouldn't let this cheap iPad deal pass you by. This offer always proves popular, and we don't expect much of that Space Gray stock to last too long.
Not in the US? You'll find plenty more iPad, and iPad Pro deals further down the page.

You'll find more 8th generation iPad deals just below, with all the lowest prices from around the web. However, you'll find more iPad Pro deals further down and the latest prices on the iPad Air 4 as well.

One of the main draws of Apple's tablet line is its seamless integration with other Apple devices. If you're kitting out a new work ecosystem, check out the latest MacBook deals to ensure you're getting the best price on a luxury laptop. Or, take a look at the latest Apple Pencil deals for an extra productivity boost.
